WorkItem.Description:
Doesn't matter which character I try to pull.  Tried messing with the tool :  options  proxy info to change to IE (I currently use foxfire) with no success.  Deleted and re-installed without fixing the issue.  This seemed to happen out of the blue about 1.5 weeks ago, I don't recall changing anything, but there is obviously some issue with my puter setup, as all runs fine on my hubby's puter.  Incidentally it will no longer load the 'did you know' information.  I must have something blocked somewhere, but I'm no computer genius.  If you have a fix for me, please speak in small easy to digest words for the less computer savvy,  Thanks in advance.  (oh, btw checked, armory isn't down when I am trying to pull these, regardless of the error message).
Â 
Error Message:  Step Name: Get Character
Description: No character returned from the Armory. The Armory may be down.

Comments.Message: Go to Internet Options in Control Panel and check the proxy settings for your connection. According to log the traffic is getting redirected to  127.0.0.1:5555. I would strongly suggest you scan your computer for malware.

You are my hero!  I did indeed have a malware attack about a week ago (my virus protection had failed to notify me my time expired in april!)  I managed to get everything cleared up (or so I thought)  but that one little thing you pointed out did the trick!  Thank you so much for taking the time to assist me!
